Articles.Content:
HI,

I have a Logitech X3D pro joystick and the throttle is going strange.

When I start a flight, my throttle does about 30% throttle to %100 throttle.

if I press x, the throttle goes to 0%, and I can throttle up to 100%, but it only goes back down to 30%.

Any help?

Edited December 18, 2014 by kerbingamer376
Unity calibrates its joystick axes on startup, so you need to set your throttle to *exactly* 50% before starting KSP
Yep I had same problem with mine with one more complication, the throttle would never really go down to zero. I had to edit the settings.cfg and set the scale value on all joystick axis to 1.1.
